title: Tteul Ahn Chae
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Korean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. They serve couple items with fish ingredients (tuna oil for Kimchi and kind of bread). Korean, mostly vegetarian buffet. Features around 20 dishes including faux meat dishes. Location is in a small valley outside town. Take a taxi and check first with hotel for opening hours (Eve 6-8 or 9pm, during the day / weekend unknown). Let them know if you are vegetarian or vegan. Very friendly and helpful staff, only Korean spoken. One person about 10.000 Kwon.
streetAddress: Ho Mae Shil Dong 821-1, Gwuon Seon Gu
